marklogic.body: I've used Windows 7 for 2.5 years without a single crash. It's rare that programs will even crash crash themselves (and when they do Windows 7 , Always recovers what I was working on), and I've never had one system failure where I had to restart the computer. Neither has anyone else I know -- the consensus in my world is that Windows 7 is the tits, and while a lot of us have issues with Windows 8 at it currently exists (Start Menus needs to return and toolbar buttons), it's fast, stable and has a lot of potential. The worst program on my PC in terms of performance? Apple iTunes, without a doubt. If my wife didn't have an iPhone I would delete this program immediately.
